column1: 16.3 Total UK Bilateral, DAC Bilateral and Multilateral Net ODA (Americas) 2005-2009
1.   Low Income Country.   Income groups are classified using 2007 GNI per capita thresholds.  See glossary for details.
2.   Data for 2009 is not yet available.
3.  DAC Countries and DAC Multilaterals data sourced from the OECD DAC Online Database. DAC annual exchange rates were used to convert from USD.
